channel.title: [Innovationx Server Error]
channel.description:
Hey guize I keep getting this error every time i try to open run.bat
The procedure entry point JVM_FindClassFromBootLoader could not be located in the dynamic link link library jvm.dll
and if I try to press "OK" it pops back up... and on the prompt it shows:
Unable to load native library: The specified procedure could not be found
I have tried reinstalling java... im not sure what else to try PLEASE HELP!!!

read my first post

item.title: [Innovationx Server Error]
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

ugh i dont like spoonfeeding but ill try to find you one if it doesnt work dont blame me i dont know your source.

@echo off
title Running your server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
java -cp .;./lib/* server
exit

i just pulled this one off a delta

Read full topic

item.title: [Innovationx Server Error]
item.dc:creator: @party_kid party kid
item.description:
@party_kid wrote:

could u post a code that might work… the current one is

@echo off
@title InnovationX
:run
java -Xms512m -Xmx512m -server Server
goto run

I just tried a couple different ones and they didnt work… at all

Read full topic

item.description:

its not your side, get another run.bat code off another server, set its path, change to fit your server most of the time u have to substitue -***** or something * = random letetrs or numbers
